     A space shuttle that holds two slowly creaks thr=
ough space as it 
heads to the blue and green planet known to its future re=
sidents as 
Earth.  The shuttle looks something like a Bident but instead o=
f two 
pokers it has two lightning bolts.  It is a metallic silver/white 
c=
olor.
  
     But enough of the space shuttle, inside the unique spaceship =

were two individuals.  They were both silver metallic.  Over their 
metall=
ic though was more metallic but this is where the two 
individuals looked d=
ifferent.  One was a shinny red metallic and the 
other was a shinny blue m=
etallic.  So for now they shall be known as 
Red and Blue.  Red was studyin=
g a map of the world known as Earth.  
Blue was sitting in the pilot's chai=
r but instead of carefully 
planning the course he had his legs up on the c=
ontrols and was 
twiddinling his thumbs.

     "Hey Brother," Red said as h=
e turned and faced his 
comrade, "What the Grease Bolting are you doing!  W=
hy aren't you 
planning our landing!  I don't want to crash.  Plan ahead."
=

      "Plan Ahead?  Yeah right!"  Blue said as he let out a small 
chuckle=
, "You are suppose to move with the flow."

      "We need a landing vector=
!"  Red yells.

      "YOU NEED a tic-tack!"  Blue yells back.

      Poor =
Poor Blue, if only he listen to his brother.  But he 
decided to not listen=

flow.  Well now they are flowin=
g on the mountains of the Northern 
Continent where they crashed.  Their ex=
act location of the crash is

t of the Predacon base

ese two bots need
